feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Valentine UI requirements to source files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text listing short descriptions of key frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with custom Valentine-themed OKLCH variables and light/dark mode values.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main page with escalating Yes/No logic, animated hearts, error message, and modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/ValentineModal.t: Popup modal showing the celebration image and message with animations and close behaviors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base layers and defines extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus custom animation delay utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that initializes React, wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors from OKLCH CSS variables, adding plugins, custom radii, shadows, fonts, keyframes, and animations.
